My Work

Mobile Direct

This is a pseudo E-Commerce web application where you can add and remove items from the cart and see totals. The application uses the context API to ease the process of passing props to child components.

  • React
  • Context API
  • Higher Order Components
  • Materialize CSS
  • Custom Modal

Beautiful User Interface!


  • User interface is responsive and styled with Materialize CSS

Custom Modal


  • Custom modal pops up when adding items to cart from the home page.
  • Add item to cart button on home page disables after item is added to cart. Must remove item from cart within the cart component itself.

Fully Functioning Shopping Cart


  • Add and remove single items from the cart
  • Clear all items from cart with separate button
  • Subtotal, tax, and grand total automatically calculated as item quantities are adjusted
